ygData.subject: Re: Problems setting up hyperNEAT 2.6
ygData.msgSnippet: I rebuild everything on my laptop and got it up and running now. Perhaps I did something wrong or it was something with 32/64bit. Anyway, thanks for all the

I rebuild everything on my laptop and got it up and running now. Perhaps I=
 did something wrong or it was something with 32/64bit. Anyway, thanks for =
all the help. Much appreciated.

--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "delodic" <rb=
k600@...> wrote:
>
> 
> Hmm that's strange because earlier I had different =
errors telling me it couldn't find those libraries. But that was because bj=
am built the libraries with visual studio 2010 and the libraries had a diff=
erent name because of that.
> 
> As for now, I have a folder C:/minimaster/=
lib/boost_1_45_0/stage/lib where all kinds of .lib files are in. Like libbo=
ost_math_c99_vc90-mt-gd-1_45.lib
> 
> In cmake i'm correctly referring to 
=
> BOOST_ROOT: C:/minimaster/lib/boost_1_45_0
> BOOST_STAGE:C:/minimaster/li=
b/boost_1_45_0/stage/lib 
> 
> I ran the bootstrap.bat in the boost root ma=
p and then ran bjam.
> 
> 
> This is a screenshot of my hyperneat cmake scr=
een
> http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/1848/cmake.png

nding your boost libraries.
> >
